data.text:
Positive:
The front desk staff is extremely helpful and friendly. 

When we phoned the front desk to ask for a few things (e.g., more coffee sachets, an extra bottle of water, etc.), they delivered almost immediately.

Very well priced.

Lots of places to eat within a 5 min walk.

MD Nazmul was very helpful and friendly.

Negative: You need to let the water run for a bit before getting hot water.
data.title: Good Place for the Price

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valuable Guest, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience 
with our services. Your feedback means a lot to us and helps us continually improve. We're committed to 
providing the best possible experience for our customers, and your kind words reinforce our dedication. 
We're truly sorry to hear about your negative experience, and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. 
We take your feedback seriously and are committed to improving our services. 
We look forward to serving you again in the future. If you have any suggestions or additional feedback, 
please don't hesitate to reach out. Thanks again for choosing us!

Best Regards, 

Piyush Tandon
Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Piyush Tandon

data.text: I would be remissed If I did not take a few moments out of my busy schedule to acknowledge the staff at Ramee Rose Hotel located in Barsha Hights. In particular the front desk staff and management and the housekeeping specifically Md Nazmul for paying close atttention to my daily needs and providing the highest level of customer service and customer satisfaction. Thank you all for making my stay a very, very good experience.  Much appreciated!
data.title: Showing appreciation!

data.text: We are regular customers of Rauchi.  Its a go to Filipino food for us. A lot of times Lavinia waits for our table. She has this warm and friendly vibe, always attentive to our needs. There's also free Karaoke. So much fun ! Definitely recommended.
data.title: Your neighborhood Pinoy food.

data.text:
Leo and Aniket is supporting person……….who do good he give support……… and very active in work given………..
Come in need . Good behaviour , friendly , nice guy……… helpful nature…….. need to give him 5 star I hope from my comments it will useful to him in anyways……

data.text: Excellent hospitality and very good approach to every where you want to go in dubai .excellent entertainment in hotel at night time. Restaurant was also very excellent quality food . All staff was vey good and friendly. Soon plane for vacation
data.title: Excellent
